00047 typedef struct {
00049         T3DFloat Pnt3D;
00051         bool Pnt3DInUse;
00053         T2DFloat Pnt2D;
00055         bool Pnt2DInUse;
00057         int Id;
00059         bool IdInUse;
00060 } TSinglePointSet;
00061 
00062 
00064 typedef struct {
00066         TSinglePointSet* pSet;
00068         unsigned int NumberOfSets;
00071         unsigned int AllocatedSets; /* internal use */
00072 } T3D2DPoints;
